amendment.description: Amendment inserts a complete new text which appears on page H4097 of the Congressional Record of May 28, 2010.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Slaughter.
